CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Register Courses stage positioned above or below the Complete the first lesson stage?
SRP.A: The Register Courses stage is positioned {above} the Complete the first lesson stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Learning Platform?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Learning Platform is {87%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the assignment?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the assignment is {46%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the first lesson?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the first lesson is {59%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Browse Course Page, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Earn a certificate, with a value of {20%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses is {15%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Pass the final test to stage Earn a certificate?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Pass the final test to stage Earn a certificate is {13%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Complete the assignment to stage Pass the final test?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Complete the assignment to stage Pass the final test is {13%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 65%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Browse Course Page} stage has {100%}, the {Register Learning Platform} stage has {87%}, the {Register Courses} stage has {72%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 26%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 39% and 79%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Courses} stage has {72%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {59%}, the {Complete the assignment} stage has {46%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to {Complete the first lesson} is equal to the reduction from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Pass the final test to Earn a certificate, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Pass the final test} to {Earn a certificate} is equal to the reduction from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses, from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Browse Course Page to Register Learning Platform?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Learning Platform} to stage {Register Courses} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Pass the final test to Earn a certificate, from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reductions from stage {Pass the final test} to {Earn a certificate}, {Register Courses} to {Complete the first lesson}, and {Complete the first lesson} to {Complete the assignment} are equal.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Register Learning Platform} and {Register Courses} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Browse Course Page} and {Register Learning Platform} stages.
